title: Raw videos of violent incidents in Texas rekindle debate about graphic images
description: News organizations have long held back from publishing explicit or violent images of death, which are now rapidly disseminated across social media platforms.

title: Facebook pivoted to the metaverse. Now it wants to show off its AI.
description: Meta CEO Mark Zuckerberg is juggling his desire to compete in the artificial intelligence arms race with the company’s longstanding big bet on the metaverse.
